summary: This memorandum discusses Ramparts magazine's claims about John Garrett Underhill Jr., Samuel George Cummings, and Interarmco's alleged involvement in a CIA gun-running, narcotics, and political intrigue racket related to the Kennedy assassination. It includes information about Underhill's background, his reported concerns about a CIA clique, and the circumstances surrounding his death. The memo also provides details about Cummings' history with the CIA, his role with Interarmco, and his contacts with other intelligence agencies. The document also mentions that these individuals and Interarmco have not been prominently featured in the Garrison investigation.
title: Ramparts: John Garrett UNDERHILL Jr., Samuel George CUMMINGS, and INTERARMCO
